text: William Edward "Bill" Haslam (born August 23, 1958) is an American politician. He was the 49th Governor of Tennessee. A member of the Republican Party, Haslam was elected Governor in 2010 and was sworn in on January 15, 2011. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:American mayors Category:Governors of Tennessee Category:Politicians from Knoxville, Tennessee Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Emory University alumni
title: Bill Haslam
